Text: Is this an H2O version? Cracked version?
OK... it's an H2O version. Installs v3.02 fine, but doesn't seem to update to v3.11. Any feedback on this?

Is this a crack? installer? patch? or whatever? I'm just curious about it's size. It's too small compared to the 5.1 version which is 3gB+. Did anybody try this? How is it and is it working? Thanks. Reply ASAP that I may decide to download this or not.
